nodes.text: Aikhibba was a Mid Rim planet in the Aikhibba system; a minor stopping point off the Gamor Run.

Aikhibba was the home to the Hutt crime lord, Spadda, during the early years of the Galactic Empire. The smuggler Lo Khan delivered a cargo of spice to Spadda from the royal governor of the Thokosia system. While the Hutt shortchanged him on the deal, it was still enough to set Khan up for life.
